isDeleted.description: Flag which marks the entry as removed.

numberOfPermissions.description: Number of permissions assigned to this role

permissions.description: Array of permissions that are assigned to this role. For POST/PUT/PATCH requests this should be a list of permission IDs

numberOfUsers.description: Number of users having this role

createdDate.description: Date when the object was created.

roleId.description: ID of the role (this field is required for PUT/PATCH requests)

modifiedDate.description: Date when the object was last modified.

description.example: This is the role for system administrators
